name: St. Claude de la Colombière

locations.description: Jesuit priest and spiritual director of St. Margaret Mary Alacoque, promoter of the Sacred Heart devotion

summary: Claude de la Colombière was a French Jesuit priest who served as the spiritual director of St. Margaret Mary Alacoque and played a crucial role in promoting devotion to the Sacred Heart of Jesus. He was exiled to England during anti-Catholic persecution but continued his ministry. He is known for his deep faith and support of the Sacred Heart revelations.
